Open Reblock

Cape Town Project

Cape Town, South Africa

The parcels in Khayelitsha, a Township outside Cape Town, South Africa shown were identified based on manual digitization of structures visible from aerial photography taken in March 2009 following a site visit by our team in June 2014 in collaboration with a data collection exercise by Community Organisation Resource Centre (CORC). During this visit we acquired detailed knowledge (and data) of neighborhood boundaries, services and access conditions.
